title: Patch Notes
content: sc instead of Nine-Fingers to match the narrative. Fixed player characters and the Narrator talking over each other when interacting with Minsc's relics in his hidden chamber. You can no longer open the barricaded doors at the Crimson Draughts apothecary from the inside. We forgot barricades are supposed to work both ways.
